name: Pineapple Glaze for Ham
author: Jackie Smith
summary: A simple, sweet glaze for that baked ham - pineapples, cherries and brown sugar.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can sliced pineapple, drained with juice reserved
directions: Before baking ham, place pineapple slices on ham with toothpicks and place cherries in center of pineapple
In a medium microwave safe bowl combine brown sugar and reserved pineapple juice
Mix together and microwave for about 5 minutes, until mixture is thick
Pour some of this glaze over the ham about every 15 minutes in the last hour of baking, until all is used
